thread.title: Is it worth buying a ‘posh garden shed to use as an extra room?
thread.title_full: Is it worth buying a ‘posh garden shed to use as an extra room? | Money | The Guardian

title: Is it worth buying a ‘posh garden shed to use as an extra room?
text:
Every week a Guardian Money reader submits a question, and it’s up to you to help him or her out – a selection of the best answers will appear in next Saturday’s paper.
This week’s question: We can’t afford a three-bed house so are thinking about a “posh” garden shed big enough for a sofa bed, as well as traditional garden storage. Is this feasible? What about using it as a more permanent extra room? Anyone done anything like this?
Do you have a problem readers could solve? Email your suggestions to money@theguardian.com or write to us at Money, The Guardian, Kings Place, 90 York Way, London N1 9GU
